message.body: you should bring mom's mail tonight!
Good idea. I will put it in the bag.
thanks! also, fun fact: the flowered bag i took to the beach during formal is still belching sand. how is that possible? it's like the most useless miracle ever.
Thats sand for you. And why i will not ride a bike i give a hoot about on the beach!
Because i learned my lesson the hard way!
